desc: Socially & environmentally responsible tea producer of pure Ceylon tea with true origin traceability from farm-to-cup. By purchasing from Walters Bay, you are promoting social and environmental initiatives in Sri Lanka where our tea is grown, processed, and packaged. Award-winning tea with a purpose.

layout.text: To provide complete transparency into our direct-from-origin tea supply chain. The well-being of our farmers and environmentally-friendly agricultural practices are critical in creating our perfect cup of tea.
